column4: I'm not sure I understand what it means to install RAM in pairs. My computer takes 4 sticks. I have one 512 and I'd like to add 1GB. Can I stick the 1GB in slot 3 and leave the 512 stick in slot 1?
go to crucial.com and search for your ram, there will be a Q & A section which will explain whether or not you need to have paired sticks
it depends on your mobo and the type of ram it takes
I did: it said I have to pair them. But I'm not sure exactly what that means.
